channel.title: Comments on: U Wouldn’t Want to Touch That

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description:
Soloed the piccolo as a holy priest, it really can be done as any char. The agro range on the mobs is almost nil, however, once they do agro, you can get many friends...
There's only one spawn spot I found impossible to kill him at (the nearest one, 2 mobs literally on top of him), as it pulls 6+ adds plus the 3 there. Otherwise it's easy.
item.content:encoded:
Soloed the piccolo as a holy priest, it really can be done as any char. The agro range on the mobs is almost nil, however, once they do agro, you can get many friends…

There’s only one spawn spot I found impossible to kill him at (the nearest one, 2 mobs literally on top of him), as it pulls 6+ adds plus the 3 there. Otherwise it’s easy.

item.title: By: Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: Actually, the Gnome dances have nothing to do with MC Hammer. Orc Dance, however, is stripped exactly from the U Can't Touch This music video.
item.content:encoded: Actually, the Gnome dances have nothing to do with MC Hammer. Orc Dance, however, is stripped exactly from the U Can’t Touch This music video.

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: if you time it right, the male gnome arm waving goes perfectly with the female gnome rump shaking. um, not that i've ever tried that. <.<
item.content:encoded: if you time it right, the male gnome arm waving goes perfectly with the female gnome rump shaking. um, not that i’ve ever tried that. <.<

item.title: By: heather (errantdreams)
item.dc:creator: heather (errantdreams)
item.description: Ha! That's an awesome animation. The male gnome dance is quite possibly my favorite, just because it's so silly.
item.content:encoded: Ha! That’s an awesome animation. The male gnome dance is quite possibly my favorite, just because it’s so silly.
